channel.title: Friends Search on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Search on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Sad Books
item.description: So I am reading Native Son by Richard Wright and it is real real hard. I don’t like it. But it is so hard to just give up on. I like his writing style. it is just the harrowing tale that is keeping me away. I don’t want it any more. It is too hard. alas, i must chug on…
